summary: This is an email from September 18, 2019, summarizing allegations from an unnamed woman regarding Jeffrey Epstein. It claims she was interviewed by the FBI in 2011 and by the SDNY, provided names of trafficked girls, and stated there were hidden cameras in Epstein's properties. The email suggests this information was planned to be publicly aired.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The central figure of the allegations, specifically accused of trafficking women and girls to other men and installing hidden cameras in his properties.

events.title: FBI Interview of Alleged Trafficker
events.description: An unnamed woman was interviewed by the FBI in 2011, during which she reportedly gave the names of all the girls she helped to traffic.

events.title: SDNY Interview
events.description: The same unnamed woman was also interviewed by the Southern District of New York (SDNY), though no specific timeframe is provided.

keyFacts: An unnamed woman claimed in a 2019 email that she was interviewed by the FBI in 2011 and gave the names of all the girls she helped to traffic.
The same woman was also interviewed by the Southern District of New York (SDNY).
Two other women reportedly told the DOJ that Jeffrey Epstein specifically trafficked them to 'other men'.
There were allegedly cameras installed in Epstein's NYC house and other properties, allowing him to watch people in bathrooms and elsewhere.
The email indicates there was a plan to publicly air this information.
